title: Gentle Seated Yoga For Beginners & All Levels | 30 Minute Practice
description:
This is a slow and gentle 30-minute yoga practice of seated and floor stretches, perfect for every body, suitable for beginners and all levels. 
Take this time for yourself to move and stretch your entire body. Be present as you connect with your breath, watch your thoughts and observe the sensations that arise. After this yoga class, you will feel relaxed and rejuvenated.

If you enjoyed this video, check out a few other beginner friendly classes:
https://bit.ly/2QTaC4R

-

Please consult with your physician prior to beginning exercise.

channelDescription:
Welcome to the channel! 

I'm Jessica, a 500-hr certified yoga instructor with a passion for health, wellness and sharing mindful movement. I'm here to support you on your yoga journey and give you the tools to live a more balanced and mindful life, both on and off the mat. 

On this channel you will find a variety of classes with different styles, lengths and levels, along with the occasional vlog or sit-down chat.

If you enjoy practicing with me and want more exclusive yoga classes, meditations + courses then check out my app, Jess Yoga - available worldwide for iOS and Android (link below). 

Thank you for practicing with me, and I’ll see you on the mat! 

For business inquiries/collaborations please email richburg.jessica@gmail.com.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/nQwKKCqkJxg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments:
I hope you enjoy this slow paced gentle practice. 🙏 it’s perfect to do any time of day!

If you‘re new to yoga check out a few other similar videos that are great for beginners:
https://bit.ly/2QTaC4R
as someone thats severely depressed, and unmotivated, i desperately want to do something to change my life, thanks for being my first step on that journey. this was wonderful
The first beginners class that is actually suitable for beginners! I have limited mobility due to being plus size but this video was great

Being a person with 120kg, I have started my diet and workout from this week. Doing this yoga in the morning helped me a lot to get comfortable with my body and I can do this without any difficulties. Yet, felt a lot of stretches in my body. Thank you so much for this beginner friendly yoga.
I am 65 and completely out of shape. This is the first yoga class I’ve been able to do all the way through. I can’t tell you how thankful I am to you. I think I can continue this.
